description.plain:
Alice Matthew (born July 19, 1993), better known by her stage name Alice Phoebe Lou, is a South African singer-songwriter who lives in Berlin, Germany.

Alice grew up on a mountainside in South Africa listening to her parent’s records and indulging her love of theatre, arts, and music at a local Waldorf school; a formative time that nurtured her independence and desire to experience music of all styles.

Alice developed her bluesy, folk sound busking on the streets of Berlin, her music focusing on captivating vocals with stripped backing music.
